member.name: T:Ganss.Excel.ColumnAttribute
member.summary: Attribute that specifies the mapping of a property to a column in an Excel file.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The name of the column.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The index of the column.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ColumnAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the column.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ColumnAttribute.Index
member.summary: Gets the index of the column.

member.name: T:Ganss.Excel.DataFormatAttribute
member.summary: Attribute that specifies the data format of an Excel cell. The format can either be a builtin format or a custom format string.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.DataFormatAttribute.BuiltinFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the builtin format, see https://poi.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/poi/ss/usermodel/BuiltinFormats.html for possible values.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.DataFormatAttribute.CustomFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom format, see https://support.office.com/en-nz/article/Create-or-delete-a-custom-number-format-78f2a361-936b-4c03-8772-09fab54be7f4 for the syntax.

member.name: M:Ganss.Excel.DataFormatAttribute.#ctor(System.Int16)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The format, see https://poi.apache.org/apidocs/org/apache/poi/ss/usermodel/BuiltinFormats.html for possible values.

member.name: M:Ganss.Excel.DataFormatAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The format, see https://support.office.com/en-nz/article/Create-or-delete-a-custom-number-format-78f2a361-936b-4c03-8772-09fab54be7f4 for the syntax.

member.name: T:Ganss.Excel.ExcelMapper
member.summary: Map objects to Excel files.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ExcelMapper.TypeMapperFactory
member.summary: Gets or sets the factory. Default is a static object that caches s statically across instances.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ExcelMapper.HeaderRow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Excel file contains a header row of column names. Default is true.
member.value: true if the Excel file contains a header row; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ExcelMapper.HeaderRowNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the row number of the header row. Default is 0. The header row may be outside of the range of and .

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ExcelMapper.MinRowNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum row number of the rows that may contain data. Default is 0.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ExcelMapper.MaxRowNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the inclusive maximum row number of the rows that may contain data. Default is .

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ExcelMapper.TrackObjects
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to track objects read from the Excel file. Default is true. If object tracking is enabled, the object keeps track of objects it yields through the Fetch() methods. You can then modify these objects and save them back to an Excel file without having to specify the list of objects to save.
member.value: true if object tracking is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Ganss.Excel.ExcelMapper.SkipBlankRows
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to skip blank rows when reading from Excel files. Default is true.
member.value: true if blank lines are skipped; otherwise, false.
